citoid-citoiddialog-search-label: URL, DOI, ISBN, PMC/PMID, QID, umutwe, cyangwa ibisobanuro
citoid-citoiddialog-use-general-error-me: ntidushobora kuguha ibisobanuro byikorere ukoresheje "{{int:citoid-citoiddialog-mode-manual}}" tab above.
citoid-desc: itanga uburyo bwo kugera hagati ya citoid servise na mediaWiki
citoid-referencecontextitem-convert-mess: iyi nyandiko igizwe gusa numurongo wo hanzwe. ushobora gukoresha "{{int:citoid-referencecontextitem-convert-button}}" buto yo hasi kugirango bikorwe neza.
citoid-unknown-error: ikosa ritazwi ryabayeho ryatubujije gukora inyandiko. wongere ugerageze nyuma.
citoid-wb-pendingdialog-error: ntibishoboka kugaragaza ibyatanzwe muri iyi nyandiko. koresha uburyo busanzwe,cyangwa wongere nyuma
